given-name.format: Given name must contain letters only.
given-name.help-message-primary: Enter exactly as it appears on applicant's primary identity document
given-name.label: Given name
given-name.max-length: Given name must contain at most {{maximum}} character(s).

last-name.format: Last name must contain letters only.
last-name.help-message-primary: Enter exactly as it appears on applicant's primary identity document
last-name.label: Last name
last-name.max-length: Last name must contain at most {{maximum}} character(s).

date-of-birth.label: Date of birth
date-of-birth.invalid-future-date: Date of birth must be in past or today.

citizenship-date.label: Citizenship date
citizenship-date.required-year: Year of citizenship date is required.
citizenship-date.invalid-year: Year of citizenship date is invalid.
citizenship-date.required-month: Month of citizenship date is required.
citizenship-date.invalid-month: Month of citizenship date is invalid.
citizenship-date.required-day: Day of citizenship date is required.
citizenship-date.invalid-day: Day of citizenship date is invalid.

recorded-name.description: The following name is recorded on the applicant's primary identity document:

preferred-name.description: Is the applicant's perferred name the same as their primary identity document name?

middle-name-error.max-length-error: Middle name must contain at most {{maximum}} character(s).

last-name-error.max-length-error: Last name must contain at most {{maximum}} character(s).

supporting-docs.title: Supporting documents
supporting-docs.description: A supporting document containing the applicant's preferred name(s) is required if the primary identity document does not contain the applicant's preferred name(s), and the change does not comply with naming rules.

doc-types.name-change: Certificate of legal change of name or Court Order
doc-types.notarial-certificate: Notarial Certificate (also called Notarial Adoption Certificate)
doc-types.resident-record: Request to Amend Record of Landing or Confirmation of Permanent Resident
doc-types.replace-imm1442: Replacement IMM1442 (WP, SP, or VR) with modification to name indicated in "Remarks"
doc-types.birth-certificate: Birth certificate contains family name to be registered
doc-types.citizenship-certificate: Certificate of Canadian Citizenship contains family name to be registered

gender.label: Gender
gender.help-message-primary: This is pre-filled from the applicant's primary identity document and can be changed.

review.read-carefully: Review information below for accuracy before creating case.

pid-verification.all-input-successful: All inputs have been successfully validated and match the primary identity document.

finalize-request.first-time: You are processing a first-time SIN request.
finalize-request.before-processing: Before processing the transaction, ensure that you have followed the SIN Application Review Process (SARP).
finalize-request.all-transactions: All transactions that you process will be recorded and could be used for quality monitoring. You are accountable for all transactions that are processed using your usercode. You must not process applications for family members or other persons with whom you have a personal relationship.
finalize-request.declaration-checkbox-label: I have considered all criteria relating to the SARP, as well as any warning messages displayed above, if applicable. I judge this application to be legitimate, accurate, complete, and meeting all program requirements. I have no personal relationship to this applicant.

error-messages.origin-of-sin-required: Please select an origin of SIN
error-messages.declaration-required: Please select whether you consent to the information provided

protect-sin.title: Protect your SIN; it is confidential
protect-sin.description: Keep any document containing your SIN in a safe place.

use-of-sin.title: Use of your SIN
use-of-sin.description: You are required to provide your SIN to your employer within three days after the day you receive it. Also, some programs and/or services authenticate a person's identity using data on the SIN record; ensure you are using the names as shown above.

sin-begin-9.title: If your SIN begins with the number 9
sin-begin-9.description: You must present a valid proof of authorization to work in Canada to your employer. Your SIN record must be updated to reflect the most recent expiry date.

more-information.title: For more information, visit our Web site:
